growerp.assessment.Assessment.description: Comprehensive assessment to evaluate organizational readiness for ERP implementation, identifying system gaps, business goals, and module requirements.

growerp.landing.LandingPage.title: ERP Readiness Assessment
growerp.landing.LandingPage.headline: Are Your Outdated Systems and Inefficient Workflows Costing You Time and Money?
growerp.landing.LandingPage.subheading: Answer a few questions about your current processes, and we'll provide a free, personalized report on why you're facing challenges and how a modular ERP can guarantee your success—without the typical headaches of a multi-year, over-budget project.

growerp.landing.PageSection.sectionDescription: Discover how our modular, open-source architecture enables a full implementation in just 1-3 months for a fixed fee. This is up to 50% faster than traditional application development.
See how our open-source model—with no licensing fees—can reduce your Total Cost of Ownership by up to 60%.
Understand how a modular system (from inventory and accounting to industry-specific tools) allows you to use only what you need and add new building blocks as you grow.

growerp.landing.CredibilityInfo.creatorBio: This assessment is built by the creators of GrowERP, a modern, open-source, multi-platform ERP. We designed it specifically to be extensible and adaptable, from small businesses to large enterprises.
growerp.landing.CredibilityInfo.backgroundText: Our platform is built on a powerful and modern Flutter (frontend) and Moqui (backend) tech stack, and it's already used to power diverse applications for: Complete Admin & Business Management, Hotel & Hospitality, and Freelancer & Project Management. This assessment uses our experience to benchmark your business against high-efficiency standards and provides a clear roadmap for your specific needs.

growerp.landing.CredibilityStatistic.statistic: Organizations using modern, integrated ERP systems see an average 40% reduction in manual data entry and operational costs.
Businesses implementing a modular ERP approach report 60% faster time-to-value compared to traditional monolithic systems.

growerp.landing.PrimaryCTA.buttonText: Start Your Fixed-Fee ERP Assessment Now!
growerp.landing.PrimaryCTA.valuePromise: Get an immediate, tailored report on your ERP Readiness Score, key bottlenecks in your current processes, and actionable steps to prepare for a rapid, fixed-fee implementation.

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestion.questionText: How do you currently manage your core business operations (like inventory, orders, and accounting)?

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestionOpt.optionText: Mostly with spreadsheets, email, and manual documents.
We use basic, separate tools (e.g., QuickBooks, Shopify) but they don't talk to each other.
We use multiple disconnected apps and software.
We have an old, on-premise ERP system that is hard to use and update.

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestion.questionText: How much time does your team spend each week on manual data entry or fixing errors between different systems?

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestionOpt.optionText: 15+ hours (It's a major part of our workload).
5-15 hours (It's a noticeable problem).
1-5 hours (It's a minor annoyance).
Almost none (Our systems are well-integrated).

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestion.questionText: How easy is it for you to get a single, accurate, real-time view of your business (e.g., sales data, inventory levels, and financials)?

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestionOpt.optionText: It's impossible. We have to guess.
It takes days to manually compile a report.
It takes a few hours.
We have real-time dashboards.

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestion.questionText: What is the biggest limitation of your current system?

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestionOpt.optionText: It's too slow and inefficient (too much manual work).
It's too rigid (we can't customize it to our needs).
It's too expensive (high subscription or licensing fees).
It's outdated (no mobile access, poor integrations).

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestion.questionText: Which of these core modules are most critical for your business?

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestionOpt.optionText: Product Catalog & Inventory
Order Processing & Accounting
User & Company Management
Website & E-commerce
Project Management (for Freelance/Services)
Reservations (for Hotel/Hospitality)

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestion.questionText: Our fixed-fee implementation gets you fully operational in 1-3 months. How does this timeline align with your goals?

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestionOpt.optionText: We needed this yesterday; we're ready to start immediately.
This timeline is ideal for our current plan.
We are planning a change in the next 3-6 months.
We are just in the early research phase.

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestion.questionText: (Current Situation) Which statement best describes your company?

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestionOpt.optionText: We're growing fast, but our processes are chaotic and holding us back.
We're stable, but our inefficient systems are costing us too much time and money.
We're just starting and need to build a solid, scalable foundation from day one.
We have an old system that we need to replace with something modern and flexible.

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestion.questionText: (Desired Outcome) What is the #1 outcome you must achieve with a new system?

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestionOpt.optionText: Reduce manual data entry and eliminate costly errors.
Get a single 'source of truth' for all business data.
Manage inventory, orders, and financials all in one place.
Stop paying high licensing fees for a system that doesn't fit our needs.

growerp.assessment.AssessmentQuestion.questionText: (Open-Ended) Is there anything else we should know about your specific requirements or biggest challenge?

growerp.assessment.ScoringThreshold.description: High Score (80-100%): You are an ideal candidate for a rapid implementation. Your operations are suffering from significant manual work and data silos. You would see an immediate ROI from a modern, integrated system.

Medium Score (50-79%): You are on the right track but facing key bottlenecks. You have some systems in place, but they are disconnected. A modular ERP would allow you to replace the most painful parts first.
Low Score (0-49%): You are in the early planning stages. Your immediate next step should be to clearly map out your primary workflows to see how a central system could help you scale.
